results.content: The way you explain every thing is awesome. Thank you for this course.
results.content_html: The way you explain every thing is awesome. Thank you for this course.

results.content:
I wasn't going to take the react crash course since I took a full react course before enrolling on this one, but you MUST take it since it is amazingly well done!.
He explains everything in detail with both functions and classes!!!!! so this is a really nice refresher. 
The mongoDB and express content was really well explained (without going in deep with validations, middleware, etc) but it gives you a grasp of how to create a full stack app!. 
Last but not least, his voice is really smooth and it doesn't bore you on each section.
Thank you so much! I really enjoyed the course a lot and there wasn't unnecesary content, right to the point!

results.content: Thanks for providing a wonderful course
